thread.title: Listen: Jerry Cantrell Streaming New Song 'A Job To Do,' It's Part Of 'John Wick: Chapter 2' Soundtrack [News]
thread.title_full: Listen: Jerry Cantrell Streaming New Song 'A Job To Do,' It's Part Of 'John Wick: Chapter 2' Soundtrack [News]

title: Listen: Jerry Cantrell Streaming New Song 'A Job To Do,' It's Part Of 'John Wick: Chapter 2' Soundtrack [News]
text:
UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 18 hours ago 9 
Alice in Chains guitar mastermind Jerry Cantrell recently contributed to the soundtrack of upcoming action movie "John Wick: Chapter 2," starring Keanu Reeves. 
The track is a result of Jerry's collaboration with Tyler Bates, the composer of the film's score. 
Cantrell stated: "I really dug 'John Wick' and have always admired Keanu's work. When the opportunity arose to create a song for the second film, Tyler Bates and I wrote and recorded 'A Job to Do', a theme song for the character. Can't wait to see it!" 
Bates added: "Jerry and I are friends and neighbors. We got together to jam and came up with the music. He's a fan of the first John Wick movie and wrote the lyrics from John Wick's introspective." 
You can listen to the track below.
